DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate overweight patient telemedically guide weight loss program influence daily vitamin D supplement - weight loss body composition , - select inflammation marker biochemical parameter lipid glucose metabolism . - select clinical parameter blood pressure , heart rate
DOC.detailed_description: Obese patient know low level vitamin D metabolite . There evidence vitamin D and/or dietary calcium may influence energy metabolism body weight . We therefore perform prospective control trial 200 overweight ( Body mass index 27-29.9 kg/m2 ) obese subject ( Body mass index > = 30 kg/m2 ) telemedically guide weight loss program . Subjects randomly receive daily vitamin D supplement placebo 1 year . Participants send body weight data study office weekly . In addition , nutritionist study office contact weekly receive support concern weight loss program . Dietary record complete monthly . Clinical parameter blood sample collect baseline , 6 12 month . It aim study investigate vitamin D effect weight loss body composition . In addition , possible vitamin D effect clinical select biochemical parameter assess . These parameter include heart rate , blood pressure , inflammation marker , parameter lipid glucose metablolism .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index > 27 kg/m2 pregnant lactate woman vegetarian patient renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl ) History renal stone gallstone patient insulin dependent diabetes mellitus parallel participation another clinical study miss inform consent subject pacemaker implantation
